attributes.action: Stop further increase to the Darford Corssing toll cost.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Dartford Crossing toll was ment to be scrapped when the bridge was paid for this has not happened, and now plans are afoot to raise the cost of the bridge toll to £1.50p. Over 50% raise in the cost of the toll when it was promised the toll would be scrapped.
